com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.oplock

Interface IOperationLockTargetListener<C>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteLockTargetListener, Slf4jOperationLockTargetListener

    public interface IOperationLockTargetListener<C>
    Represents a lock target listener that receives notifications of an appearing or disappearing IOperationLockTarget in an AbstractOperationLockManager instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void targetAcquired(IOperationLockTarget target, C context)
      Called when a lock for a target is granted in an AbstractOperationLockManager.
      void targetReleased(IOperationLockTarget target, C context)
      Called when a lock for a target is released in an AbstractOperationLockManager.

    • Method Detail

      • targetAcquired

        void targetAcquired(IOperationLockTarget target,
                    C context)
        Called when a lock for a target is granted in an AbstractOperationLockManager.
        Parameters:
        target - the added lock target (may not be null)
        context - the lock context (may not be null)

      • targetReleased

        void targetReleased(IOperationLockTarget target,
                    C context)
        Called when a lock for a target is released in an AbstractOperationLockManager.
        Parameters:
        target - the removed lock target (may not be null)
        context - the lock context (may not be null)
